name: Marco Casali ditta individuale
membership: European Register of Euro-projects Designers and Managers
goal:
Organize information meetings between public and / or private citizens / companies and the institutions of the European community.
Promote the activities and initiatives of the European Union in all business, association and ONLUS NGOs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Helping citizens in filling in and submitting applications to grants and / or investment / co-financing programs.
Spread and publicize the successes achieved by entrepreneurs and citizens through collaboration with the European Union.
